name: wrap
label: Wrap Deformer
description:
Multi-threaded wrap deformer (C++) for maya with rebind capabilities, tangential smooth algorithm and custom octree for faster bind.
Developed at Mikros Animation and  used on several feature films.

name: collide
label: Collision Deformer
description:
Multi-threaded collision deformer (C++) for maya
Developed at Mikros Animation and  used on several feature films.

name: wire
label: Wire Deformer
description:
Multi-threaded wire deformer (C++) for maya.
Developed at Mikros Animation and  used on several feature films.

name: muxdemux
label: Curve Multiplex-Demultiplex
description:
Custom maya nodes (C++) to aggregate/separate a bunch of curves.
With this node we only ONE curve to rig and animate, while rendering thousands.
Developed at Mikros Animation and  used on several feature films.

name: drawer
label: OpenGL Drawer
description:
Set of commands and node for visual debug (C++).
Draw points, lines, loops, triangles, matrix and text in the viewport.
Unvaluable when prototyping a node.
Developed at Mikros Animation and  used while prototyping above nodes.
